item.title: Ansible Core
item.description: The moment I learned the true power of Ansible in any form was the thresehold I would say is the absolute starting point of the Intermediate phase of my career. I had heard of Ansible, Chef and Salt on Reddit but never thought important. After all, one machine in a vacuum hardly seems like something that needs help containing. When I finally got in a production environment and needed to be able to have full control of my fleet is when I started taking it serious.

item.title: Network Bound Disk Encryption (NBDE)
item.description: Imagine you are in an environment where full disk encryption is necessary at all times. Imagine that you also must deliver your environment to a remote location akin to being an on-prem managed server. Now Imagine All the previous constraints need to be fulfilled without user interaction. After all one simply cannot input the disk encryption key everytime the system boots. It must be able to do it on its own under certain circumstances and know not to unlock in others.

item.title: About
item.description: I am Jank. Jank the Munkey. I go by that on the web, but my real name is Skylar Houghton. I have a passion for IT and found that automation is where i really excel. Automation with a focus on security. Locking things down and ensuring things are secure on the web are a niche i feel at home with. I started this project to show others things that I have learned in the process and the legacy I have with them as well.
